subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ひ|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ひ}} {{m|zh|被|tr=bje<sup>H</sup>||to cover}}, from the term's use in Chinese as a [[passive]] marker.

subSections.title: Prefix
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|おおい}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|被う|tr=ōu||to cover}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|おおい|hhira=おほい}}

# a [[covering]]
# the [[act]] of [[covering]] something
# {{lb|ja|sort=おおい|by extension}} a [[protector]] or [[patron]]
